game.name: À La Mine
game.categories: Multi-player, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: À la Mine is a strategy game where dwarves compete to become owners... or end up exploited! Dominate territories by winning auctions or using dynamite to eliminate your rivals in this ruthless struggle.
game.shortDescriptionEn: À la Mine is a strategy game where dwarves compete to become owners... or end up exploited! Dominate territories by winning auctions or using dynamite to eliminate your rivals in this ruthless struggle.
